bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a psychiatric problem with mental instability and use of strange language. It was believed that this is caused by fox demons or hostile magic. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry hu yin jing 狐陰莖：狐魅狀候，或叉手有禮見人，或於靜處獨語，或裸形見 人，或祗揖無度，或多語，成緊合口，叉手坐，禮度過，常尿屎亂放， 此之謂也 , “The signs of fox seduction-specter : patients may display rituals ofreverence [without being in an appropriate situation]. Or they speak to themselves in quiet places. Or they expose themselves to others undressed. Or they excessively bow with their hands clasped. Or they are talkative. Or their mouth is firmly closed. They sit with their hands laid together, perform the rites excessively, and they frequently pass urine and defecate in a disorderly way. This is what that means”.
